entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
